p: Although COVID-19 appears to have a lower severity and mortality rate than two other previous human coronavirus (CoV) infections (SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV), a subgroup of patients (particularly elderly people and those with underlying medical co-morbidities) develop a severe disease characterized by interstitial pneumonia and the rapid development of acute respiratory distress syndrome or septic shock with high levels of acute-phase reactants [ 3, 4].
